docket_entries.description: Minute Entry for proceedings held before Magistrate Judge Gabriel W. Gorenstein:Initial Appearance on disposition sheet as to Nazo Gaprindashvili held on 6/7/2014. Deft present with atty Lance Lazzaro. AUSA Andrew Adams and Andrew Thomas present. Agreed conditions of release: $200,000 PRB, 2 FRP, Travel restricted to SDNY/EDNY; Surrender travel documents (& No new applications), Pretrial supervision: Regular. Deft to be released on own signature; remaining conditions to be met by 6/14/17. (jw)
COMPLAINT as to Nikoloz Jikia (1), Bakai Marat-Uulu (2). In Violation of 18 U.S.C. 371, 924 (c), (1) (A) (i), 1958 & 2 (Signed by Magistrate Judge Henry B. Pitman) (dif)[1:17-mj-04235-UA]

Minute Entry for proceedings held before Magistrate Judge Gabriel W. Gorenstein:Initial Appearance as to Bakai Marat-Uulu held on 6/7/2017. Defendant is present with attorney John M Burke; AUSAs Adams and Thomas are also present. Defendant is detained on consent without prewudice. (jm)
CJA 23 Financial Affidavit by Evgheni Melman appointing cja attorney Irving Cohen. (Signed by Judge Magistrate Judge Gabriel W. Gorenstein) (jm)

Minute Entry for proceedings held before Magistrate Judge Gabriel W. Gorenstein:Initial Appearance as to Evgheni Melman held on 6/7/2017. Deft. is present with attorney Irving Cohen; AUSAs Adams and Thomas are also present. Deft. is to be released on a $200,000 PRB; 2 FRPs; travel restricted to SDNY/EDNY; surrender travel documents & no new applications; regular PTS supervision. PTS can insert electronic devices in his home at any time. Released on own signature with remaining conditions to be met by 6/14/17. (jm)
CJA 23 Financial Affidavit by (17-Cr-350-04) Hamlet Uglava. APPROVED: (Signed by Magistrate Judge Gabriel W. Gorenstein on 6/7/2017); Attorney Richard Ma. (bw)
CJA 23 Financial Affidavit by Akaki Ubilava appointing cja attorney Donna Newman. (Signed by Judge Magistrate Judge Gabriel W. Gorenstein) (jm)

Minute Entry on "Disposition Sheet" for proceedings held before Magistrate Judge Gabriel W. Gorenstein: Initial Appearance as to Hamlet Uglava (4) held on 6/7/2017. AUSAs Andrew Adams, Andrew Thomas. Defense Counsel Richard Ma (CJA). Proceeding: Rule 9. BAIL DISPOSITION: Detention on consent without prejudice. ADDITIONAL PROCEEDINGS: Defendant arraigned; pleads Not Guilty. (bw)
NOTICE OF ATTORNEY APPEARANCE: Andrew James Frisch appearing for Alex Mitselmakher (25). (bw)

Minute Entry on "Disposition Sheet" for proceedings held before Magistrate Judge Gabriel W. Gorenstein: Initial Appearance as to Alex Mitselmakher (25) held on 6/7/2017. AUSAs Andrew Adams, Andrew Thomas. Defense Counsel Andrew Frisch (Retained). Proceeding: Rule 9. BAIL DISPOSITION: Agreed conditions of release; $200,000 PRB; 3 FRP; travel restricted to SDNY/EDNY; surrender travel documents (& no new applications); pretrial supervision as directed by Pretrial Services; Defendant to submit to urinalysis, if positive, add condition of drug testing/treatment. Defendant to be released on own signature; remaining conditions to be met by 6/14/2017. ADDITIONAL PROCEEDINGS: Defendant arraigned; pleads Not Guilty. (bw)

Minute Entry for proceedings held before Magistrate Judge Gabriel W. Gorenstein:Initial Appearance as to Akaki Ubilava held on 6/7/2017. Defendant is present with attorney Donna Newman; AUSAs Adams and Thomas are also present. Defendant is to be released on a $200,000 PRB; 3 FRPs; travel restricted to SDNY/EDNY; surrender travel documents & no new applications. Defendant is to be released on own signature with remaining conditions to be met by 6/14/17. (jm)
CJA 23 Financial Affidavit by (17-Cr-350-18) Andriy Petrushyn. APPROVED: (Signed by Magistrate Judge Gabriel W. Gorenstein on 6/7/2017); Attorney Arnold J. Levine. (bw)

Minute Entry on "Disposition Sheet" for proceedings held before Magistrate Judge Gabriel W. Gorenstein: Initial Appearance as to Andriy Petrushyn (18) held on 6/7/2017. AUSAs Andrew Adams, Andrew Thomas. Defense Counsel Arnold Levine (CJA). Proceeding: Rule 9. BAIL DISPOSITION: Detention on consent without prejudice. ADDITIONAL PROCEEDINGS: Defendant arraigned; pleads Not Guilty. Conference before District Judge on 6/9/2017 at 12 noon. Speedy Trial Time excluded under 18 U.S.C. Section 3161(h)(7) until 6/9/2017. (bw)
CJA 23 Financial Affidavit by (17-Cr-350-20) Levan Makashvili. (Signed by Magistrate Judge Gabriel W. Gorenstein on 6/7/2017); Attorney Xavier Donaldson. (bw)

MEMO ENDORSEMENT as to (17-Cr-350-06) Mikheil Toradze on re: [486] LETTER by Mikheil Toradze addressed to Judge Katherine B. Forrest from Attorney Bobbi C. Sternheim dated 01/08/2018 re: Bail Modification. I write to request a slight modification of Mikheil Toradze's bail conditions. We are seeking permission for Mr. Toradze to take children to Campgaw Mountain this coming weekend. This snow resort is located in Mahwah, New Jersey, which is directly adjacent to the Rockland County border of the Southern District. ENDORSEMENT: Application granted. (Signed by Judge Katherine B. Forrest on 1/9/2018)(bw)
